spell_tooltip.description: Reduces the cooldown of Fortifying Brew by 50%.
Your next Keg Smash deals 50% additional damage, and stuns all targets it hits for 3 sec.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 768,440 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 1 million Nature damage to all enemies, and 722,119 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Provoked targets move towards you at 50% increased speed.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 120 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 215,960 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Grants Shuffle for 5 sec and reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 3 sec.

Clears 50% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Instantly heals you for 25% of the damage cleared.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 443,396.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 444,829.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
When you fall below 40% health, you gain an absorb for 30% of your recently Purified damage, or a minimum of 8% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 135,312 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1.4 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
When you would be healed above maximum health, you instead convert an amount equal to 40% of your critical strike chance to a heal over time effect.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 97,417 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 61,099 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
When you consume a Healing Sphere or cast Expel Harm, your current Stagger amount is lowered by 5%.
Blackout Kick's damage increased by 20% and it strikes an additional 2 targets.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.

Fortifying Brew increases Stagger effectiveness by 15% while active.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.
Gain up to 15% Mastery based on your current level of Stagger.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for 8 sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal 50% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Fire on the target.

Stagger is 4% more effective at delaying damage.

You gain up to 10% Haste based on your current level of Stagger.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 525,455 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 40,732 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.
Tiger Palm has a 50% chance to deal 200% of normal damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of your Brews by 1 additional sec.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to 3 additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for 3 sec.

For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 9%. Additionally, Keg Smash cooldown is reset instantly and enemies hit by Keg Smash or Rising Sun Kick take 8% increased damage from you for 10 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Triggering a bonus attack from Press the Advantage or casting Weapons of Order releases a surge of chi at your target's location, dealing Nature damage split evenly between all targets over 8 sec.

 Press the Advantage:
Deals 389,172 Nature damage.

 Weapons of Order:
Deals 778,344 Nature damage and reduces the cooldown of Weapons of Order by 4 for each affected enemy, to a maximum of 20 sec.

Store vitality from 15% of your damage dealt and 7% of your effective healing.

For 10 sec after casting Celestial Brew your spells and abilities draw upon the stored vitality to deal 40% additional damage over 8 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 100% increased damage and healing.
When Aspect of Harmony ends, any remaining vitality is expelled as damage over 8 sec, split among nearby targets.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 5%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Casting Tiger's Lust reduces the remaining cooldown on Roll by 5 sec.
Celestial Brew has 1 additional charge.
Fortifying Brew applies a Chi Cocoon, absorbing 2.2 million damage.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 25% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Purifying Brew stores 128,122 vitality, increased based on Stagger level.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage, it has a chance to spread to a nearby enemy. When you directly attack an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Kick upwards, dealing 747,894 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 8 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 5 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 1 million Nature damage to all enemies, and 724,883 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Provoked targets move towards you at 50% increased speed.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.

Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 120 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 435,272.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 430,267.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
When you fall below 40% health, you gain an absorb for 30% of your recently Purified damage, or a minimum of 8% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.
Summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 195,694 Physical damage over 8.4 sec to all enemies within 8 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 61,099 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.

Summons an effigy of Niuzao, the Black Ox for 25 sec. Niuzao attacks your primary target, and frequently Stomps, damaging all nearby enemies.

While active, 40% of damage delayed by Stagger is instead Staggered by Niuzao.
When you consume a Healing Sphere or cast Expel Harm, your current Stagger amount is lowered by 5%.
Blackout Kick's damage increased by 20% and it strikes an additional 2 targets.

Weapons of Order calls forth Niuzao, the Black Ox to assist you for 12 sec.

Triggering a bonus attack with Press the Advantage has a chance to call forth Niuzao, the Black Ox.

Fists of Fury's damage is increased by 100% of your haste and Fists of Fury does 10% more damage each time it deals damage, resetting when Fists of Fury ends.

Your auto attack speed is increased by 60% for 8 sec after Fists of Fury ends.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 171,099 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.

Draws in the positive chi of all your Healing Spheres to increase the healing of Expel Harm.
Rising Sun Kick increases the damage your target receives from you by 3% for 12 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Blackout Kick critical strike chance increased by 10% and critical damage increased by 18%.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2%. This effect is increased by 100% while Xuen, the White Tiger is active.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 30% and its radius is increased by 15%.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 530,262 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.
The Blackout Kick! effect also increases the damage of your next Blackout Kick by 350%.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.
Each successive attack that triggers Combo Strikes in a row grants 1% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.
The duration of Storm, Earth, and Fire is extended by 0.25 sec for every Chi you spend.

During Storm, Earth, and Fire, Chi costs are reduced by 1 and Blackout Kick reduces the cooldown of affected abilities by an additional 1 sec. 

Activating Storm, Earth, and Fire resets the remaining cooldown of Rising Sun Kick and grants 2 Chi.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 898,877 Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
When you consume Blackout Kick!, you have a 100% chance to generate 1 Chi.
Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 20 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.9 sec with Tiger Lightning for 35,111 Nature damage.

Strike of the Windlord grants you 4 stacks of Thunderfist and an additional stack for each additional enemy struck. 

Thunderfist discharges upon melee strikes, dealing 295,405 Nature damage.
You have a 100% chance to gain Blackout Kick! after consuming Dance of Chi-Ji.
You gain 33% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Targets hit by Strike of the Windlord have a 100% chance to be struck for 10% additional Nature damage from your spells and abilities for 10 sec.

Performs a devastating whirling upward strike, dealing 874,545 damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 551,185 damage to the first target struck. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.
Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger's damage is increased by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Strike of the Windlord's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its damage is increased by 100%.
Whirling Dragon Punch has a 100% chance to activate Dance of Chi-Ji and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.

Envelop yourself in razor-sharp winds, then lunge forward dealing 1.6 million Nature damage to enemies in your path. Damage reduced beyond 5 enemies.

Hold to increase lunge distance.

Xuen claws your target for 619,251 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.

Invoking a celestial guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of  by 75% for .
Fortifying Brew grants you an absorb shield for 25% of your maximum health.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.

You switch between alignments after an August Celestial assists you, increasing a corresponding secondary stat by 2%.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.
Heals the target for 1.7 million over 7.5 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 765,667 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Kick upwards, dealing 751,083 Physical damage.
Grants an additional charge of Roll and Chi Torpedo.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.

Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.

Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
